contents:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM.
Order affirmed 9 Pa.Cmwlth. 602, 309 A.2d 161. See Commonwealth v. Weldon Pajamas, Inc., 432 Pa. 481, 248 A.2d 204 (1968).
ROBERTS, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
NIX, J., concurs in the result.
JONES, C. J., dissents.
